meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Elana Schor Andy Greeley Nicole Cocklin Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7883.

td.p: Elana Schor, a journalist from Washington, D.C.
Andy Greeley, an elections administrator from Seattle, Washington
Nicole Cocklin, a travel agent from Fort Wayne, Indiana (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,001)

tr.td: FAMOUS WOMEN
21st CENTURY FILMS
TOOLS ARE CONFUSING
3 WORDS FOR 3 LETTERS
(Alex: Each clue will be three words. Each correct response will be three letters only.)
READ IT
A.M.A.
